response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would greatly benefit you as well. Given its importance and the unique features it offers, I am proposing a purchase price of $1,200,000. This amount reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also the potential benefits it could bring to you. I look forward to hearing your response and discussing how we might proceed with this exciting opportunity. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
